Package de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDrawPanel
    Interface for draw panels for GUI models.
    IGuiModel
    Sub type of IModel for GUI models.
    IGuiModelController
    Interface for controllers for GUI models representing a Petri net.
    IModelRename
    Non-public interface for methods that should be visible to the model controller only.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawPanel
    The draw panel for one Petri net.
    GuiModel
    Implements the GUI model of a Petri net.
    GuiModelController
    Observes the state of the GUI.
    MyMouseAdapter
    MouseAdapter for the DrawPanel to select and move nodes and to show popup menus.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EMouseEvent
    Events that will be recognized by MyMouseAdapter.
